00029   const char *RangeServerProtocol::m_command_strings[] = {
00030     "load range",
00031     "update",
00032     "create scanner",
00033     "fetch scanblock",
00034     "compact",
00035     "status",
00036     "shutdown",
00037     "dump stats",
00038     "destroy scanner",

00042     "replay commit",

00047   const char *RangeServerProtocol::command_text(short command) {
00048     if (command < 0 || command >= COMMAND_MAX)
00049       return "UNKNOWN";
00050     return m_command_strings[command];
00051   }
00052 
00053   CommBuf *RangeServerProtocol::create_request_load_range(TableIdentifier &table, RangeSpec &range, const char *transfer_log, RangeState &range_state, uint16_t flags) {
00054     HeaderBuilder hbuilder(Header::PROTOCOL_HYPERTABLE_RANGESERVER);
00055     CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(hbuilder, 2 + table.encoded_length() + range.encoded_length() + Serialization::encoded_length_string(transfer_log) + range_state.encoded_length() + 2);
00056     cbuf->append_short(COMMAND_LOAD_RANGE);
00057     table.encode(cbuf->get_data_ptr_address());
00058     range.encode(cbuf->get_data_ptr_address());
00059     Serialization::encode_string(cbuf->get_data_ptr_address(), transfer_log);
00060     range_state.encode(cbuf->get_data_ptr_address());
00061     cbuf->append_short(flags);
00062     return cbuf;
00063   }
00064 
00065   CommBuf *RangeServerProtocol::create_request_update(TableIdentifier &table, StaticBuffer &buffer) {
00066     HeaderBuilder hbuilder(Header::PROTOCOL_HYPERTABLE_RANGESERVER);
00067     CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(hbuilder, 2 + table.encoded_length(), buffer);
00068     cbuf->append_short(COMMAND_UPDATE);
00069     table.encode(cbuf->get_data_ptr_address());
00070     return cbuf;
00071   }

00073   CommBuf *RangeServerProtocol::create_request_create_scanner(TableIdentifier &table, RangeSpec &range, ScanSpec &scan_spec) {
00074     HeaderBuilder hbuilder(Header::PROTOCOL_HYPERTABLE_RANGESERVER);
00075     CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(hbuilder, 2 + table.encoded_length() + range.encoded_length() + scan_spec.encoded_length());
00076     cbuf->append_short(COMMAND_CREATE_SCANNER);
00077     table.encode(cbuf->get_data_ptr_address());
00078     range.encode(cbuf->get_data_ptr_address());
00079     scan_spec.encode(cbuf->get_data_ptr_address());
00080     return cbuf;
00081   }

00083   CommBuf *RangeServerProtocol::create_request_destroy_scanner(int scanner_id) {
00084     HeaderBuilder hbuilder(Header::PROTOCOL_HYPERTABLE_RANGESERVER, scanner_id);
00085     CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(hbuilder, 6);
00086     cbuf->append_short(COMMAND_DESTROY_SCANNER);
00087     cbuf->append_int(scanner_id);
00088     return cbuf;
00089   }
00090 
00091   CommBuf *RangeServerProtocol::create_request_fetch_scanblock(int scanner_id) {
00092     HeaderBuilder hbuilder(Header::PROTOCOL_HYPERTABLE_RANGESERVER, scanner_id);
00093     CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(hbuilder, 6);
00094     cbuf->append_short(COMMAND_FETCH_SCANBLOCK);
00095     cbuf->append_int(scanner_id);
00096     return cbuf;

00099   CommBuf *RangeServerProtocol::create_request_drop_table(TableIdentifier &table) {
00100     HeaderBuilder hbuilder(Header::PROTOCOL_HYPERTABLE_RANGESERVER);
00101     CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(hbuilder, 2 + table.encoded_length());
00102     cbuf->append_short(COMMAND_DROP_TABLE);
00103     table.encode(cbuf->get_data_ptr_address());
00104     return cbuf;
00105   }

00149   CommBuf *RangeServerProtocol::create_request_drop_range(TableIdentifier &table, RangeSpec &range) {
00150     HeaderBuilder hbuilder(Header::PROTOCOL_HYPERTABLE_RANGESERVER);
00151     CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(hbuilder, 2 + table.encoded_length() + range.encoded_length());
00152     cbuf->append_short(COMMAND_DROP_RANGE);
00153     table.encode(cbuf->get_data_ptr_address());
00154     range.encode(cbuf->get_data_ptr_address());
00155     return cbuf;
00156   }
